pullRequest.title: Log difference between old and new partition infos in PartitionDiscoveryThread, minor improvements for other logs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Important: DO NOT REPORT SECURITY ISSUES DIRECTLY ON GITHUB.

commit.message: Log difference between old and new partition infos in PartitionDiscoveryThread, minor improvements for other logs
Adding datastream name to latency warn log

nodes.bodyText: IMO, Splitting this in two lines will make the search easier while debugging.

Converting these list into set, cache the set as well and doing:
added = NewSet - ExistingSet or NewSet.removeall(existingSet)
removed = ExistingSet - NewSet or ExistingSet.removeall(NewSet)
will make this operation faster. Right now its O(N^2) complexity.

commit.message: Convert list to set to track added and removed topic partitions
